docs.abstract: Many of us can recite the intimate details of our friends’ sex lives, their pharmacological habits, their rents. But question their weights and their mouths clamp shut.
docs.snippet: Many of us can recite the intimate details of our friends’ sex lives, their pharmacological habits, their rents. But question their weights and their mouths clamp shut.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a first, working-age people now make up the majority in U.S. households that rely on food stamps — a switch from a few years ago, when children and the elderly were the main recipients.

headline.main: The New Face of Food Stamps: Working-Age Americans
headline.print_headline: The New Face of Food Stamps: Working-Age Americans

docs.abstract: As digital persons, we’re vulnerable to new, digital injustices.

docs.lead_paragraph: An agreement on the long-overdue U.S. farm bill could be completed as soon as Monday, followed by final approval likely within days, the Washington Post reported on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Farm Bill Agreement Could Come Within Days: Report

docs.lead_paragraph: Pepsico, Nestle and Cisco on Friday announced major investments that together totalled more than $7 billion (4 billion pounds) in Mexico, where the government has pushed through a series of economic reforms that aim to boost foreign investment and growth.
